title: India's PNB says can recover from giant fraud
text:
India's PNB says can recover from giant fraud 9:10am EST - 01:23 
Punjab National Bank (PNB), India's second-largest state-run lender, says it has the capability and capacity to recover after uncovering a staggering $1.77 billion fraud at one of its branches that went undetected for years. David Pollard reports.
